data.title: Taking voice notes on Google just got a lot better
data.text: Now you can use Google Assistant with Google Keep, Any.do, Bring!, or AnyList.

data.title: Alphabet’s Pichai is clearly in charge, but faces some major headaches
data.text: Sundar Pichai just got a big promotion and inherited a major headache.

data.title: This Week in Tech: What on Earth Is a Quantum Computer?
data.text: The question isn’t so easy to answer. Also, Google’s founders stepped away just as their company enters a turbulent adulthood.

data.title: A Google Branded Smartwatch Could Bring In About $4 Billion To Google’s Top Line By 2023
data.text: In early November, Google (NASDAQ: GOOG) announced plans to acquire fitness tracking pioneer Fitbit for about $2.1 billion, in a move that signals the Internet behemoth’s increasing interest in the fast-growing wearables market. While the company already has some exposure to the smartwatch space.

data.title: GOOGL, AMZN, MSFT & Others to Watch in Healthcare Industry
data.text: Tech giants like Alphabet, Amazon, IBM, Microsoft and Apple are foraying into the healthcare industry to capitalize on its prospects.
